issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Using the aws cli configured for use with eucalyptus:

{code}
#
# aws configure set s3.signature_version s3v4
#
#
# aws configure set region eucalyptus
#
#
# cat .aws/config 
[default]
region = eucalyptus
s3 =
    signature_version = s3v4
#
#
{code}

Uploading a large (~5g) object fails with an out of memory error:

{code}
#
#
# ll zero4g.dat 
-rw-r--r--. 1 root root 5000000000 Jan  3 15:01 zero4g.dat
#
#
# time aws --endpoint $S3_URL s3 cp zero4g.dat s3://steve/zero4g-8.dat
upload failed: ./zero4g.dat to s3://steve/zero4g-8.dat Could not connect to the endpoint URL: "http://s3.d-20.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/steve/zero4g-8.dat?partNumber=458&uploadId=3TPNXITVSINKKR9MKQOKRFOYYZPUXGDVSCXHGN5GU3RSO5TNXUKXKWC3WRP6WPO8"

real	5m27.593s
user	0m40.909s
sys	0m6.431s
#
#
{code}

From cloud-error.log:

{code}
Tue Jan 3 16:00:50 2017 ERROR [SystemBootstrapper:web-services-client-pool-2] [com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.SystemBootstrapper$1.uncaughtException(SystemBootstrapper.java):167] java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
{code}

From /var/log/messages:

{code}
Jan  3 16:00:07 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "HouseKeeper"
Jan  3 16:00:12 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "web-services-client-pool-5"
Jan  3 16:00:28 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "eucalyptus-bootstrap-listenerregistry-listenertasks-worker-837"
Jan  3 16:00:30 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "eucalyptus-bootstrap-hosts-normal-pool.org.jgroups.protocols.UDP$PacketReceiver#10
0#unicast receiver"
Jan  3 16:00:37 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "eucalyptus-bootstrap-hosts-worker-105"
Jan  3 16:00:41 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "web-services-worker-pool-20"
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: 2017-01-03 16:00:49 ERROR java.lang.Thread.getStackTrace(Thread.java:1556)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.SystemBootstrapper$1.uncaughtException(SystemBootstrapper.java:165)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: java.lang.ThreadGroup.uncaughtException(ThreadGroup.java:1057)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: java.lang.ThreadGroup.uncaughtException(ThreadGroup.java:1052)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: java.lang.ThreadGroup.uncaughtException(ThreadGroup.java:1052)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: java.lang.ThreadGroup.uncaughtException(ThreadGroup.java:1052)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: java.lang.Thread.dispatchUncaughtException(Thread.java:1956)
Jan  3 16:00:50 d-20 eucalyptus-cloud: 2017-01-03 16:00:50 ERROR java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
{code}

This does not look like the same issue as EUCA-13046 as it relates to many "small" uploads rather than a single large upload.

When ServiceContextHandler was modified so it retained a reference to the message class rather than the message this issue could not be reproduced.
fields.summary: S3 out of memory on multipart upload of large object using signature v4

comments.body:
Aws cli can now upload a ~4g file without oom:

{code}
#
# head -c 5000000000 /dev/zero > zero5g.dat
#
#
# ll zero5g.dat 
-rw-r--r--. 1 root root 5000000000 Jan  5 22:49 zero5g.dat
#
# 
# eval $(euca-generate-environment-config)
# 
#
# aws --endpoint $S3_URL s3 mb s3://steve/
make_bucket: steve
# 
# 
# for N in {1..10}; do time aws --endpoint $S3_URL s3 cp zero5g.dat s3://steve/zero5g-$N.dat; done
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-1.dat                   

real	0m57.046s
user	1m10.367s
sys	0m12.447s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-2.dat                   

real	1m2.862s
user	1m9.452s
sys	0m12.251s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-3.dat                   

real	1m4.091s
user	1m10.340s
sys	0m12.227s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-4.dat                   

real	1m0.364s
user	1m10.001s
sys	0m11.963s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-5.dat                   

real	1m2.678s
user	1m9.794s
sys	0m11.934s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-6.dat                   

real	1m2.893s
user	1m10.730s
sys	0m12.366s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-7.dat                   

real	0m58.360s
user	1m12.344s
sys	0m12.675s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-8.dat                   

real	0m59.489s
user	1m11.429s
sys	0m12.441s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-9.dat                   

real	0m58.018s
user	1m11.421s
sys	0m12.678s
upload: ./zero5g.dat to s3://steve/zero5g-10.dat                  

real	1m1.451s
user	1m12.138s
sys	0m12.415s
#
#
# aws --endpoint $S3_URL s3 ls s3://steve/
2017-01-05 22:52:24 5000000000 zero5g-1.dat
2017-01-05 23:02:03 5000000000 zero5g-10.dat
2017-01-05 22:53:55 5000000000 zero5g-2.dat
2017-01-05 22:54:59 5000000000 zero5g-3.dat
2017-01-05 22:56:00 5000000000 zero5g-4.dat
2017-01-05 22:57:03 5000000000 zero5g-5.dat
2017-01-05 22:58:06 5000000000 zero5g-6.dat
2017-01-05 22:59:04 5000000000 zero5g-7.dat
2017-01-05 23:00:04 5000000000 zero5g-8.dat
2017-01-05 23:01:02 5000000000 zero5g-9.dat
#
#
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
